name: MP Mini Golf
description:
Simple mini golf game with 18 holes made as a demonstrable prototype for a multiplayer mini golf game.

One course game with simple controls. Use the mouse to aim and shoot, the arrow keys to look around, with mouse scroll to zoom. Made using Unity a long time ago, source code lost but found this prototype on my hard drive.

*Update - Uploaded multi player build

Launch two versions, one windowed to use as a server. Clients can then join via connect to server but the host must start the map manually by clicking start on the server window. **Hamachi recommended.
